actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Human Resources.

official_title: A bill to amend the Juvenile Justice and Delinquency Prevention Act of 1974 to provide for assistance to State educational agencies for counseling and related services.

summary.text: Juvenile Delinquency Prevention Counseling Act - Amends the Juvenile Justice Delinquency Prevention Act of 1974 to authorize the Administrator of the Law Enforcement Assistance Administration to make grants to State educational agencies to assist them in developing educational programs and alternative schooling practices and providing counseling, including family counseling, and related services in the context of a State effort of prevention and treatment of delinquent behavior.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Juvenile Justice and Delinquency Prevention Act of 1974 to provide for assistance to State educational agencies for counseling and related services.
